text: vastavaniki, kharun, musa jatiki cendinavade. Kani atadu variki vyatirekanga tirugubatu cesadu. Mariyu memu atadiki enno nidhulanu icci untimi. Vati talavu cevulanu balavantulaina padi mandi leda antakante ekkuva mandi kuda ento kastanto matrame moyagalige varu. Atadi jati varu atanito annaru: "Nivu virravigaku, niscayanga, allah virravige varini premincadu
